name: Wiped Dragon Shooter Legend
description:
Wiped Dragon Shooter Legend is hunt down all kinds of different dinos in various environments. Sometimes they may attack you back so always be alert. Develop a steady hand, line up your sights, and master the skills to take the perfect shot.
Features:
- Thrilling dino hunter missions and different dino models.
- Intuitive and easy accuracy shooting controls.
- Sniper zoom in and zoom out fully integrated.
- Ultimate crazy safari combat battle.
- Smooth controls, UI interface and stunning background music.
